metadata.title: CVE-2023-37769 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: stress-test master commit e4c878 was discovered to contain a FPE vulnerability via the component combine_inner at /pixman-combine-float.c.

notes.note: alexmurray> Whilst the CVE description mentions the stress-test binary (which is only part of the test suite in pixman and itself is not distributed in Ubuntu) it is not clear if this is a bug in the underlying library code itself or just in stress-test mdeslaur> as of 2023-07-18, there is no upstream fix available for this issue

criterions.comment: pixman package in kinetic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-07-18').
